actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit gain from certain involuntary or compulsory conversions to be reportable over a 10-year period.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit ten-year averaging of gain from any involuntary conversion resulting from requisition or condemnation by the United States or any State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit gain from certain involuntary or compulsory conversions to be reportable over a 10-year period.
